methods.name: SetButton
methods.comment: Sets our internal button that will be used for focus handling

methods.name: SetHoldTime
methods.comment: Sets how long one produce cycle should take

methods.name: OnReleasedButton
methods.comment: Internal button was released, added BlueprintCallable to be able to simulate button release

properties.name: OnManufacturePressed
properties.comment: Called when a valid press on manufacture happens

properties.name: mLastPressTime
properties.comment: Saving when we last pressed button

properties.name: mHoldTimeMax
properties.comment: How long to hold for a manufacture to be called

properties.name: mHoldTime
properties.comment: How long has the button been held?

properties.name: mInternalButton
properties.comment: Reference to the UButton we have internally
